name: Nancy Miller Gomez
bio: Poet Nancy Miller Gomez grew up in Kansas. Her work has appeared in River Styx, Rattle, The Bellingham Review, Nimrod and elsewhere. She earned an MFA in writing from Pacific University. She has worked as a stable hand, an attorney, and a television producer. She lives in Santa Cruz, California, where she volunteers as the director of the Santa Cruz Poetry Project, an organization that provides poetry and writing workshops to incarcerated men and women.
